name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the contractor of the Brazilian factory of Chinese automaker BYD was exposed to "enslaving Chinese employees".

Blogger "Bogo" disclosed more information: In addition to hiring workers from China, the Jinjiang Group also hired 470 local workers in Brazil, but the living environment, work intensity and other treatment of Brazilian and Chinese workers are completely different.

The equity of the Jinjiang Group was changed to BYD in 2017, which means that the Jinjiang Group is actually a subsidiary of BYD.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 27, a blogger used a video of "the master sitting in a sedan chair and talking about how to reduce the burden on sedan chair bearers" to satirize China's formalism and bureaucracy. 
Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 27, human rights lawyer Peng Yonghe released a video criticizing the phenomenon of leaders being condescending when facing citizens: "We pay them to support them, not to let them lead us, but to let them serve us."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One blogger said: "If a European or American missile hit a civilian airliner, all news platforms in China would broadcast this story over and over for three days and three nights."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Blogger "Shadow Will Not Lie" attracted a large number of fans and attention by exposing the installation of hidden cameras in hotels and other places.
According to a report on December 27, police in many places cracked down on a criminal gang that installed "hidden cameras" to hype up the "rampant" phenomenon of hidden cameras and made illegal profits. "Shadow Will Not Lie" and 35 other people were arrested.
Netizens said that this can also be reversed. Is there still trust between people?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a viewer said that he recommended the movie "Fancheng" to people around him, but found that people no longer believed in Hong Kong movies. The lead actor Andy Lau said, "I will keep working hard, please believe me."
Netizen "Taozi" said: It's not that Hong Kong movies are of poor quality, but that the current Hong Kong movies are to be screened in the mainland, and the censorship system is very strict, which is very different from before the return. The color tone and script of the movie can't go back to the past, and the actors and producers sometimes can't speak out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Liu Qiang, who once set fire in front of the Yasukuni Shrine, recently wore a Christmas hat and wished everyone a happy Christmas in Chinese and English, which was criticized by fans.
His fans said "You have changed"
"Brother Qiang, it is not appropriate for you to wear this hat"
"The hero must be thinking that he is disappointed with his achievements"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27, Shaanxi. Migrant workers kneel outside the company to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, the police came to the Chengdu Early Rain Church to summon them for a Christmas dinner at home.
Multiple domestic video accounts refuted the rumor, saying that the reason for the dinner was that the church was listed as an illegal social organization by the Civil Affairs Department and banned according to law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a criminal defense lawyer popularized the chaos of occupying a pit defense. By forcibly appointing two lawyers, the defendant's own lawyer could not meet with the defendant or participate in the defense, and could not even enter the court gate. The forcibly appointed lawyers occupied the pit without doing anything, thus depriving the defendant of the right to defense.
The blogger complained that he was also asked by a certain agency to connect with the occupying pit, and asked him to occupy the pit as a defense lawyer for the case and not to speak in court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens complained in the comment area that the defense of the local lawyers was not confrontational at all, and was all about human relations. Only lawyers from other places dared to defend the case, because they were not afraid of offending the locals. However, even if they could not say a word of the prosecutor's defense, they would still be sentenced according to the prosecutor's suggestion in the end. You can defend as you like, and he can knock as he likes.
Some people said that he had experienced the court not opening the trial, but directly notifying him to receive the result, and was sentenced to 10 months in prison and suspended for one year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Dongfeng Qichen car owners in Zhengzhou collectively went to the 4S store to hang banners to protect their rights. At first, the car owners found that their vehicle batteries had seriously degraded after only three years of use, and the promised battery warranty became empty talk. In addition, the 4S store replaced the original car battery with a used battery of unknown origin without the owner's consent during maintenance, which caused the car owners to collectively hang banners to protect their rights and put slogans on their vehicles.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 26, a family member of a Henan Rural Commercial Bank called the Xinyang Municipal People's Court to inquire about the situation of a detained rural commercial bank depositor who was seeking to recover his deposits. He had been detained for almost a year on suspicion of "picking quarrels and provoking trouble" because he had gone to Henan several times to get his deposits back. The court neither held a trial nor released him.
